Template.OutputScope:
# # Copyright ©2020-2021 WellEngineered.us, all rights reserved. # Distributed under the MIT license: http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php #
cls $root = [System.Environment]::CurrentDirectory
$build_flavor_dir = "Debug" $build_tool_cfg = "Debug" $src_dir = ".\src" $robocopy_exe = "robocopy.exe" $msbuild_exe = "C:\Program Files (x86)\MSBuild\12.0\bin\amd64\msbuild.exe"
echo "The operation is starting..."
&"$msbuild_exe" /verbosity:quiet /consoleloggerparameters:ErrorsOnly "$src_dir\${ModuleName}.sln" /t:clean /p:Configuration="$build_tool_cfg" > _msbuild_log.txt
if (!($LastExitCode -eq $null -or $LastExitCode -eq 0)) { echo "An error occurred during the operation."; return; }
&"$msbuild_exe" /verbosity:quiet /consoleloggerparameters:ErrorsOnly "$src_dir\${ModuleName}.sln" /t:build /p:Configuration="$build_tool_cfg" >> _msbuild_log.txt
if (!($LastExitCode -eq $null -or $LastExitCode -eq 0)) { echo "An error occurred during the operation."; return; }
echo "The operation completed successfully."

using System.Reflection; using System.Runtime.InteropServices;
#if DEBUG
[assembly: AssemblyConfiguration("Debug")] #else [assembly: AssemblyConfiguration("Release")] #endif
[assembly: AssemblyCompany("comapny")] [assembly: AssemblyProduct("product")] [assembly: AssemblyCopyright("©years company, all rights reserved.")] [assembly: AssemblyDescription("description")] [assembly: AssemblyTrademark("trademark™")] [assembly: AssemblyCulture("")] [assembly: AssemblyVersion("0.0.0.*")] [assembly: AssemblyInformationalVersion("yyyy.mm.dd")] [assembly: AssemblyFileVersion("0.0.0.0")] [assembly: AssemblyDelaySign(false)] [assembly: ComVisible(false)]

preProject SolutionAssemblyInfo.cs = SolutionAssemblyInfo.cs EndProjectSection EndProject Project("{10000000-0000-0000-0000-00000000FFFF}") = "${ModuleName}", "${ModuleName}\${ModuleName}.csproj", "{FFFF0000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001}" EndProject Project("{10000000-0000-0000-0000-00000000FFFF}") = "${ModuleName}.UnitTests", "${ModuleName}.UnitTests\${ModuleName}.UnitTests.csproj", "{FFFF0000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002}" EndProject Project("{10000000-0000-0000-0000-00000000FFFF}") = "${ModuleName}.IntegrationTests", "${ModuleName}.IntegrationTests\${ModuleName}.IntegrationTests.csproj", "{FFFF0000-0000-0000-0000-000000000003}" EndProject Global GlobalSection(SolutionConfigurationPlatforms) = preSolution Debug|Any CPU = Debug|Any CPU Release|Any CPU = Release|Any CPU EndGlobalSection GlobalSection(ProjectConfigurationPlatforms) = postSolution {FFFF0000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001}.Debug|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Debug|Any CPU {FFFF0000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001}.Debug|Any CPU.Build.0 = Debug|Any CPU {FFFF0000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001}.Release|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Release|Any CPU {FFFF0000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002}.Debug|Any CPU.Build.0 = Debug|Any CPU {FFFF0000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002}.Release|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Release|Any CPU {FFFF0000-0000-0000-0000-000000000003}.Release|Any CPU.Build.0 = Release|Any CPU EndGlobalSection GlobalSection(SolutionProperties) = preSolution HideSolutionNode = FALSE EndGlobalSection EndGlobal

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<configuration> <connectionStrings> <add name="${ModuleName}::ConnectionString" connectionString="${ConnectionString}" providerName="${ConnectionType}" /> </connectionStrings> <appSettings> <add key="${ModuleName}::DataSourceTag" value="${DataSourceTag}" /> <add key="${ModuleName}::UseDatabaseFile" value="false" /> <add key="${ModuleName}::KillDatabaseFile" value="false" /> <add key="${ModuleName}::DatabaseFileName" value="" /> <add key="${ModuleName}::DatabaseDirectoryPath" value="" /> </appSettings> </configuration>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<configuration> <connectionStrings> <add name="${ModuleName}::ConnectionString" connectionString="${ConnectionString}" providerName="${ConnectionType}" /> </connectionStrings> <appSettings> <add key="${ModuleName}::DataSourceTag" value="${DataSourceTag}" /> <add key="${ModuleName}::UseDatabaseFile" value="false" /> <add key="${ModuleName}::KillDatabaseFile" value="false" /> <add key="${ModuleName}::DatabaseFileName" value="" /> <add key="${ModuleName}::DatabaseDirectoryPath" value="" /> </appSettings> </configuration>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<configuration> <connectionStrings> <add name="${ModuleName}::ConnectionString" connectionString="Data Source={0};FailIfMissing=True" providerName="System.Data.SQLite.SQLiteConnection, System.Data.SQLite" /> </connectionStrings> <appSettings> <add key="${ModuleName}::DataSourceTag" value="net.sqlite" /> <add key="${ModuleName}::UseDatabaseFile" value="true" /> <add key="${ModuleName}::KillDatabaseFile" value="true" /> <add key="${ModuleName}::DatabaseFileName" value="${ModuleName}.database" /> <add key="${ModuleName}::DatabaseDirectoryPath" value="{0}" /> </appSettings> </configuration>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <NUnitProject> <Settings activeconfig="Debug"/>
<Config configfile="App.config" name="Debug"> <assembly path="bin\Debug\${ModuleName}.UnitTests.dll"/> </Config>
<Config configfile="App.config" name="Release"> <assembly path="bin\Release\${ModuleName}.UnitTests.dll"/> </Config>
</NUnitProject>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <NUnitProject> <Settings activeconfig="Debug_(${DataSourceTag})"/>
<Config configfile="App.(${DataSourceTag}).config" name="Debug_(${DataSourceTag})"> <assembly path="bin\Debug\${ModuleName}.IntegrationTests.dll"/> </Config>
<Config configfile="App.(net.sqlite).config" name="Debug_(net.sqlite)"> <assembly path="bin\Debug\${ModuleName}.IntegrationTests.dll"/> </Config>
<Config configfile="App.(${DataSourceTag}).config" name="Release_(${DataSourceTag})"> <assembly path="bin\Release\${ModuleName}.IntegrationTests.dll"/> </Config>
<Config configfile="App.(net.sqlite).config" name="Release_(net.sqlite)"> <assembly path="bin\Release\${ModuleName}.IntegrationTests.dll"/> </Config>
</NUnitProject>

<Compile Include="${FolderName}\I${ProcedureNameSingularPascalCase}_Request.g.cs" /> <Compile Include="${FolderName}\I${ProcedureNameSingularPascalCase}_Result.g.cs" /> <Compile Include="${FolderName}\I${ProcedureNameSingularPascalCase}_Response.g.cs" /> <Compile Include="${FolderName}\${ProcedureNameSingularPascalCase}_Request.g.cs" /> <Compile Include="${FolderName}\${ProcedureNameSingularPascalCase}_Result.g.cs" /> <Compile Include="${FolderName}\${ProcedureNameSingularPascalCase}_Response.g.cs" />
